name: Kathryn H. SAILOR, Administratrix of the Estate of Bertha Grajewski, a/k/a Bertha Graski, Deceased, et al. v. Albert GRAYCE et al.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Kathryn H. SAILOR, Administratrix of the Estate of Bertha Grajewski, a/k/a Bertha Graski, Deceased, et al. v. Albert GRAYCE et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed.
Appellant to bear costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Henry N. Fineman, Philadelphia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
354 A.2d 249
Kathryn H. SAILOR, Administratrix of the Estate of Bertha Grajewski, a/k/a Bertha Graski, Deceased, et al. v. Albert GRAYCE et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 1976.
Neil Cárver, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Henry N. Fineman, Philadelphia, for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
